text: Blue, isn't it lovely here? It feels like we're the only ones in the world.
God dammit she ran off again.
She's doing this on purpose, isn't she? Just trying to hurt me, just to get my attention.
After all we've been through. She's my one and only, and I'm hers. What happened?
Blue ! Blue ! There you are, come help me!
You left me alone, Blue! I almost got lost looking for you!
Is it me? Did I say something that upset you? Is that why you're pulling away?
Just yesterday we were fine, I felt like we were in heaven! But now, every silent step you take, it's like a dagger in my heart!
Don't you know how much your silence hurts me? How can I understand what you're feeling if you won't let me in?
You are my everything love, why can't you see that?
THEN WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU ??
